waypoints.onload:
onFinish = 'logout' -- "logout" or "loginNextChar" or a function or nothing openMats = UMMD_chooseFlag ('open?') donateMats = openMats and UMMD_chooseFlag ('donate?') or false useBibliothek = UMMD_chooseFlag ('bibliothek?')
ids = { {'Beet', 204831, 'Unbekannte Pflanze'}, {'Esse', 204832, 'Unbekanntes Erz'}, {'Holzlager', 204833, 'Unbekanntes Holz'}, }
function openItems (id) if openMats==false then return end local building, tools, product = table.unpack (ids[id]) repeat local items = inventory:findItemsRegexp (product) if items~=nil then for _,item in pairs(items) do for i=1,item.ItemCount do if inventory:itemTotalCount (0)==0 then break end item:use () end end end if donateMats==true then GuildDonate() end until items==nil end
function harvest (id) local building, tools, product = table.unpack (ids[id]) local tmp = player:findNearestNameOrId (building) if tmp then player:target_NPC (tmp.Id) yrest (1000) while inventory:itemTotalCount (tools)>0 do player:target_Object (building, nil, nil, true) end end openItems (id) end
openItems (1) openItems (2) openItems (3)
if getZoneId ()~=401 then repeat if player:target_NPC (111621) or player:target_NPC (113416) or player:target_NPC (111731) then RoMScript ("ChoiceOption(2)"); yrest (750) waitForLoadingScreen () elseif not travelTo ('VaranasCastleWest') then if inventory:itemTotalCount (203784)>0 then inventory:useItem (203784) yrest (750) waitForLoadingScreen () else print ('unable to enter the guild castle') player:sleep () end end zID = getZoneId () until zID == 401 end
__WPL:setWaypointIndex (math.min (__WPL:getNearestWaypoint (player.X, player.Z), 4))
waypoints.waypoint: useBibliothek = useBibliothek and (RoMScript ("GetPlayerExpDebt()")<0) if not useBibliothek then if onFinish=='logout' then player:logout () return elseif onFinish=='loginNextChar' then loginNextChar () return elseif type(onFinish)=="function" then onFinish () return end error ('finished'); end
player:target_Object ("Bibliothek", 10000, nil, true) while RoMScript ("GetPlayerExpDebt()")<0 do yrest (10000) end __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)
